business.pricing: Fees vary by item type and scope. Contact Elizabeth Antique Appraisal Service to confirm pricing and scheduling.

content.about: Elizabeth Antique Appraisal Service provides appraisals for fine art, antiques, collectibles, and household goods in Ottawa, Ontario. Services include in-home visits (by appointment), written appraisal reports, and an online evaluation option.
content.notes: Contact is sourced from appraisalottawa.com (phone/email/address) to ensure this listing reflects Elizabeth Antique Appraisal Service and not any other Ottawa auction house.

address.formatted: 440 Laurier Ave W Suite 200, Ottawa, ON K1R 7X6

business.pricing: Appraisal and consignment fees vary by item type and scope. Contact Pridham’s to confirm rates and scheduling.

content.about: Pridham’s Auctions & Appraisals is an Ottawa–Montreal auction house offering appraisal services for fine and decorative arts, with appointments available in Ottawa.
content.notes: This listing contains Pridham’s official Ottawa contact details to prevent misattribution to other businesses.

business.pricing: Appraisal fees vary by collection size and complexity. Contact Heritage Valuations Ottawa in Ottawa, ON for a tailored quote.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Ottawa provides professional antique appraisal services in the Ottawa area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving Ottawa, ON clients who need antique valuations in Antique Furniture, Vintage Collectibles, Estate Jewelry.

reviews.author: Sarah T.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Linda M.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

reviews.author: Michael B.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.
